page.title: 07Mint Juleps
page.content:
My sister Debbie is a singer in an acapella group called The Mint Juleps. They started off as 20 and are now only 6.Their debut was at a stag night at The Half Moon Theatre in Mile End Road. This was 2 years ago in 1983 since then they have been signed up by Stiff Records.They have appeared on lots of television programmes,Blue Peter,TV AM, Reporting London ,Black On Black and Tube just to mention a few.They have also been on the radio lots of times. They have toured with Kool and the Gang and Sister Sledge. They are all from Tower Hamlets.
David Longworth(10)
